channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Terrifying moment Aussie surfer has legged ripped off in brutal great white shark attack
item.description: Kai’s leg was bitten by the shark so severely that it was torn off, with the entire body part later washing up on the beach after he managed to get himself back to shore in Port Macquarie

item.title: Sharks ‘high on cocaine’ after drugs are being flushed down the loo
item.description: It could be affecting their behaviour making them more aggressive.

item.title: Powerful photo shows female officer with blood dripping down face at violent Southport riot
item.description: More then 50 police officers were left injured by scores of suspected EDL rioters descending on the quiet residential street close to where a knife attack that killed three children took place

item.title: 'Southport's night of carnage terrified me - but brave shining light reminded me of humanity'
item.description: Mirror reporter Lucy Thornton has told of her horror at the violent scenes in Southport on Tuesday night that left her "amazed" that nobody was killed as objects were launched at police

item.title: Lawyer thought headaches were due to job but it was fast-growing brain tumour
item.description: Amy Wareham was on a trip to New York when she had a sudden seizure. She has been battling the cancer ever since

item.title: 'Hidden gem' with no tourists has crystal clear waters and stunning beaches
item.description: Mercedes Zach, who works for the travel company ASAP Tickets, has shared her insight on where you should next go on holiday - if you are looking for sun, sea and sand
